name: Fair Food Party!
description:
Experience the Fun of the Fair with Fair Food Party!

Now you can make and enjoy your favorite Fair snacks just like you're really there! Make all those fun tasty treats you love to munch on when you go to the Fair!

More fun treats are coming soon to an iphone near you!

Cool stuff in this game ….

* Candy Apple Maker!
* Lemonade Maker!
* Addicting and Awesome!
* Fun for kids of all ages!
